flavor: the most horrible thing that could possibly exist
the exact taste of the last thing tasted
a changing array of flavors, first sweet, then acid, then bitter and so on
having fireworks of flavor explode inside, except some are not nice at all
an unknown flavor, that remains impossible to identify
a flavor that could be described as seeing a cute puppy with your mouth
effect: when drunk the creature will feel suddenly inspired to create art
will make those who drink it sleep a deep sleep
when drunk will make a random part of your body invisible
will drive those who drink it insane, with visions of hell and torment
will make those who drink it look frail and sick, but only in appearance
when drunk will attract vermin and pests, who all feel the need to mate immediately
will animate the drinkers shadow, which will cause mischief before returning
when drunk will permanently change the eye colors and pupils in some random way
will give those who drink it a vision and a quest that they must do immediately
will make those who drink it vomit a red liquid that might be confused with blood.
will make those who quaff it smell of fresh cookies or bakery
will hydrate, but do absolutely nothing else for those who drink it.
makes those who sample it desire seafood with an angst that can drive them into rage
when quaffed will make a voice whisper erotic fantasies into the drinkers ears
the drinker can speak with fish, but other creatures can't understand what they are saying
makes the drinkers hair grow wildly at one hundred times the normal rate
will polymorph those who drink it into a random gem, a scroll or a sword
will give the person enormous farts, which they find smell good, but makes all others sick
will empty the hearts of those who drink it of all desire, making them docile and obedient
makes those who taste it understand that «all things are connected» in oneness with nature
when sampled will exchange the senses, so to hear the color red and taste the sound of rain
